Blog.post: lolx...haiz..school going to start liao..i scared i cannot wake up from my sweet little dreams..lolx..need my mum to call me waje up by then..got tuition juz now..so sian..then also feel very stress after that...cos now my head inside all is numbers onli..then can't think of any other things..except 4 edison..my sis went to sentosa yesterday..play till the nite,,11 plus then return..then luckily my mum haven call by that time..or else i also dunnoe how to explain..i very worried for zg..cos he feel very sad..then i dun wanna see him so sad also lorz..cos he my kor..haiz..but it's fate..that's what i tell him also..i really hope that he won't feel so sad..he sad i also will sad de..

hihi..haha..so happy today..went out with shingjiuan and kelvin..then we took neoprints..but all also very funny de..wasted..haha..but still very happy..dunnoe why also..but horz..come back still muzt do homework..then muzt read storybook..wah..hate it man..but horz..i still very the happy..i go crazy liaoz..lolx..byebye:)

haiz..sianz sia..suppose to go out today but can't contact my fren..also dunnoe what to do at home..can someone just help me??hahax..holidays pass so fast de horz...going to go school liaoz..then muzt face all those pressure again..but at least still can have some more fun in school..haha..when is my mum going to come back??help..i need her to bring me out!!or else I'll be bored to death..she bring me out then i dun need to pay anything mahz..haha..clever horz??yesterday my sis brought her frenz home..did i tell u??i hope so..then she thought i heard their gossip..haha..but actually i didn't lorz..haiz..dunne she and her bf how liaoz..like break liaoz..but like not like that..cos she still hide the pic that she took with him in her wallet..thought that i dunnoe...but i still kept it as a secret..cos i dun want my mum to know..quite happy to know that she gt bf also lorz..cos she can finally find her true love liao mah..she also cannot always be so blur one..me??i still gt no bf..still thinking twice whether shld have or notz..haiz..all teh guys like lying to me de worz..i dun wanna get trick again..ok lahz..i stop here now..write again some other day..byebye..

Haha..today went to watch shrek 2..so funny..but horz..i went out with 2 guys..then they both talk among themsevles..but luckily i msg "edison"..then he entertain me..lolx..came back home quite early..but still very boring..cos my sis ask her frenz to come and i'm leftout again..haiz..dunnoe lorz..gt alot of problems..then dunnoe how to solve..some cannot even solve somemore..GOD PLS HELP..then now thinking of some of the seniors that are leaving this year..haiz..will miss them cos they are the one who brighten up my life..but there's a song 4 them..sometimes goodbye though it hurts in ur heart is the only way for destiny..sometimes goodbye though it hurts it's the onli way now for u and me..though it's the hardest thing to say..i miss ur love in every way..so say goodbye..but dun u cry..cos true love never die..haiz..i think i shall stop here now..:(
aiyo..i still not familiar with this stupid thing..haiz..can anyone help me??

haha..so long never write liao..tis time muzt write longer...my results drop alot..also dunnoe why..shld stop playing and focus on it liaoz..if not next year cannot get into a pure science class..tell u wat..i continue my piano lessons already..becos of the o level music selection test..now so stress...my sis always take the bus *** but not **...now then i noe the reason why...cos she can see him..lolx...his brother also not bad..dunnoe why when i saw the brother on the bus he'll always give that smile..lolx..maybe i think too much liao..but see him then will be like happy...dun get the wrong idea..i got no feelings for him..haha..dunnoe how's my sis relationship...hope that it's going on well..also dun wish to see them break..today saw baby cliffton..so CUTE!!haha..play with him for about 5 hours..i gotta stop here..will write again the next time..BYEZ!!
